data.name: RPG Sounds - Bard Tales - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Bard Tales is an RPG Sounds pack of Sound Effects. It includes:

SFX
  • Charm Harp
  • Charm Hurdy Gurdy
  • Charm Ocarina
  • Charm Santoor
  • Charm Violin
  • Cure Harp
  • Cure Hurdy Gurdy
  • Cure Ocarina
  • Cure Santoor
  • Cure Violin
  • NegativeBansuri
  • Negative Harp
  • Negative Hurdy Gurdy
  • Negative Santoor
  • Negative Violin
  • Neutral Harp
  • Neutral Hurdy Gurdy
  • Neutral Ocarina
  • Neutral Santoor
  • Neutral Violin
  • Positive Harp
  • Positive Hurdy Gurdy
  • Positive Ocarina
  • Positive Santoor
  • Positive Violin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
